CaMKK2 酶能否成为治疗双相情感障碍的关键？研究人员探索了 CaMKK2 信号通路在双相情感障碍中的作用，建议将其作为新的治疗靶点。通过针对这种酶，科学家们的目标是开发针对双相情感障碍症状和代谢功能障碍的更有效的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Could-CaMKK2-enzyme-be-the-key-to-treating-bipolar-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Could-CaMKK2-enzyme-be-the-key-to-treating-bipolar-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba11d99c-6dea-4606-971a-e9528391ce31 Sun, 24 Sep 2023 23:41:00 -0400 Could CaMKK2 enzyme be the key to treating bipolar disorder?
二甲双胍能否改变非糖尿病患者的心脏健康？研究人员利用孟德尔随机化方法发现，改变七种二甲双胍目标可以改善非糖尿病个体的血压和体重指数。该研究表明二甲双胍在降低普通人群心血管风险方面具有潜在作用，但还需要更多研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Could-metformin-be-a-game-changer-for-heart-health-in-non-diabetics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Could-metformin-be-a-game-changer-for-heart-health-in-non-diabetics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b3c3c82-4c53-4196-90a5-ac4ec6c462f5 Sun, 24 Sep 2023 23:33:00 -0400 Could metformin be a game changer for heart health in non-diabetics?
COVID-19 大流行是否扩大了英国的心理健康差距？该研究探讨了 COVID-19 大流行对英国成年人口的不同心理健康影响，揭示了不平等和痛苦的加剧。该研究利用调查和焦点小组讨论，强调迫切需要采取有针对性的干预措施和政策应对措施，以解决日益恶化的心理健康和日益扩大的差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Has-the-COVID-19-pandemic-widening-the-mental-health-gap-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Has-the-COVID-19-pandemic-widening-the-mental-health-gap-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=266c5748-6b14-4942-86f7-0c44bb9ab929 Sun, 24 Sep 2023 23:26:00 -0400 Has the COVID-19 pandemic widening the mental health gap in the UK?
偏头痛与乳腺癌风险之间的遗传联系被发现利用孟德尔随机化分析，该研究发现偏头痛易感性与整体乳腺癌和雌激素受体阳性乳腺癌风险增加之间存在遗传联系。然而，研究结果表明解释时要谨慎，强调需要进一步研究来巩固这些关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Genetic-link- Between-migraines-and-breast-cancer-risk-uncovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Genetic-link- Between-migraines-and-breast-cancer-risk-uncovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69b46a87-14e9-4e5c-8956-161ac9cbda7b Sun, 24 Sep 2023 23:16:00 -0400 Genetic link between migraines and breast cancer risk uncovered
比较两种用于阿尔茨海默病检测和监测的血浆 p-tau217 检测方法研究人员比较了两种基于生物标志物 p-tau217 的市售血液测试，用于诊断 294 名患者的阿尔茨海默病。两项测试都展示了强大的诊断能力，与 PET 扫描中确定的阿尔茨海默病生物标志物密切相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Comparing-two-plasma-p-tau217-assays-for-Alzheimers-detection-and-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Comparing-two-plasma-p-tau217-assays-for-Alzheimers-detection-and-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25086ec4-bd18-4d27-a071-55b3d780b40a Sun, 24 Sep 2023 23:07:00 -0400 Comparing two plasma p-tau217 assays for Alzheimer's detection and monitoring

日常化学物质会增加癌症风险，尤其是女性这项研究确定了接触 PFAS、对羟基苯甲酸酯和苯酚等化学物质与癌症风险增加之间的联系，特别是在女性和跨种族群体中。这些发现强调了环境毒素在激素相关癌症中的作用，为癌症预防和缓解策略提供了新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Everyday-chemicals-linked-to-increased-cancer-risk-special-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Everyday-chemicals-linked-to-increased-cancer-risk-special-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=129bb8aa-80ab-429c-97f9-ba602b2d7915 Sun, 24 Sep 2023 22:24:00 -0400 Everyday chemicals linked to increased cancer risk, especially in women
运动增强林奇综合征患者的免疫防御有氧运动，特别是骑自行车，有望减少林奇综合征患者结肠组织的炎症和增强免疫反应，林奇综合征患者是结直肠癌的高危人群。该研究表明，定期锻炼可能为该患者群体提供预防方法，但还需要进一步的随机试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Exercise-boosts-immune-defense-in-Lynch-syndrome-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230924/Exercise-boosts-immune-defense-in-Lynch-syndrome-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=780574bb-0589-43b0-b56e-15d73653b7b0 Sun, 24 Sep 2023 22:15:00 -0400 Exercise boosts immune defense in Lynch syndrome patients
